00001 /**************************************************************************
00002 $Header: wn_shad.c Sun 11-19-2000 10:50:01 pm HvA V1.00 $
00003 ***************************************************************************/
00004 
00005 #include "video/v_video.h"
00006 #include "window.h"
00007 
00008 extern SCREEN _cursvar;
00009 
00010 /*#+func-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00011     FUNCTION: wn_shadow()
00012      PURPOSE: Give a given window a shadowed border on bottom and right side
00013       SYNTAX: int wn_shadow(WINDOW *w);
00014  DESCRIPTION:
00015      RETURNS: FALSE if no window opened,
00016               TRUE if all OK
00017      HISTORY: 09-Oct-1993 V0.1 - Initial version
00018 --#-func----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00019 int wn_shadow(WINDOW *w)
00020 {
00021   #define SHADOWC 16*BLACK+DARKGRAY
00022 
00023   if (!w)           /* Check if window opened */
00024     return(FALSE);
00025 
00026   if(w->wx2 < _cursvar.cols && w->wy2 < _cursvar.lines) {   /* Check if shadow within screen */
00027     v_setattrib_area(w->wy2+1,w->wx1+1,w->xsize,1,SHADOWC);  /* bottom */
00028     v_setattrib_area(w->wy1+1,w->wx2+1,1,w->ysize,SHADOWC);  /* right  */
00029     return(TRUE);
00030   }
00031   else
00032     return(FALSE);
00033 
00034 }
